name: Invoke-Obfuscation RUNDLL LAUNCHER
description: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via RUNDLL LAUNCHER
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.event_data.Payload:*rundll32.exe* AND winlog.event_data.Payload:*shell32.dll* AND winlog.event_data.Payload:*shellexec_rundll* AND winlog.event_data.Payload:*powershell*)`
